actions.text: On agreeing to the Hayes amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mrs. Hayes.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hayes amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to codify the current precedent of the National Labor Relations Board governing voluntary recognition of a union by an employer which ensures collective bargaining between the union and employer can proceed for a reasonable period of time (one year) without requiring an intervening election.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to codify the current precedent of the National Labor Relations Board governing voluntary recognition of a union by an employer which ensures collective bargaining between the union and employer can proceed for a reasonable period of time (one year) without requiring an intervening election.
